nodes.id: 中国工商银行股份有限公司

zh-cn: 中国工商银行股份有限公司
en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Limited

location.zh-cn: 中国北京市西城区复兴门内大街55号

description.zh-cn: 中国最大的商业银行之一，也是全球市值最高的银行之一。成立于1984年，由中国人民银行的工商信贷和储蓄业务分离而设立。
description.en: One of the largest commercial banks in China and one of the world's largest banks by market capitalization. Established in 1984, it was formed by separating the industrial and commercial credit and savings business from the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行股份有限公司现任董事长。
description.en: Current Chairman of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Limited.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行股份有限公司现任行长。
description.en: Current President of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Limited.

nodes.id: 中央汇金投资有限责任公司

zh-cn: 中央汇金投资有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的主要股东之一。
description.en: One of the major shareholders of ICBC.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国财政部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国财政部
en: Ministry of Finance of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的主要股东之一。
description.en: One of the major shareholders of ICBC.

zh-cn: 香港中央结算代理人有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的上市地点之一，其代理人公司也是工行的主要股东之一。
description.en: One of the stock exchanges where ICBC is listed. Its nominee company is also a major shareholder of ICBC.

nodes.id: 全国社会保障基金理事会

zh-cn: 全国社会保障基金理事会
en: National Council for Social Security Fund

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的主要股东之一。
description.en: One of the major shareholders of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行。中国工商银行由其工商信贷和储蓄业务分离而设立。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China. ICBC was established by separating its industrial and commercial credit and savings business.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府，于1983年决定分拆中国人民银行业务，成立中国工商银行。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, which decided in 1983 to spin off the business of the People's Bank of China to establish ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的上市地点之一。
description.en: One of the stock exchanges where ICBC is listed.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国工商银行行长及董事长。
description.en: Former President and Chairman of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国工商银行行长、副董事长。
description.en: Former President and Vice Chairman of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国工商银行行长及董事长。
description.en: Former President and Chairman of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国工商银行行长。
description.en: Former President of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国工商银行董事长。
description.en: Former Chairman of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国工商银行行长。
description.en: Former President of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国工商银行行长。
description.en: Former President of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国工商银行行长。
description.en: Former President of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 香港前财政司司长，曾任中国工商银行独立董事。
description.en: Former Financial Secretary of Hong Kong, served as an independent director of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 高盛公司前总裁，曾任中国工商银行独立董事。
description.en: Former president of Goldman Sachs, served as an independent director of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 美国伯克利加州大学经济系教授，曾任中国工商银行独立董事。
description.en: Professor of Economics at the University of California, Berkeley, served as an independent director of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 香港股市指数编制公司，于2007年将工商银行纳入恒生指数成份股。
description.en: A Hong Kong stock market index compiler, which included ICBC as a constituent stock of the Hang Seng Index in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 南非最大的银行之一，中国工商银行是其第一大股东。
description.en: One of the largest banks in South Africa, of which ICBC is the largest shareholder.

zh-cn: 工银金融租赁有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的下属机构，是中国大陆首家银行背景的金融租赁公司。
description.en: A subsidiary of ICBC, it is the first bank-backed financial leasing company in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 香港的银行，曾将其加拿大和美国子公司部分股权出售给中国工商银行。
description.en: A Hong Kong-based bank that sold stakes in its Canadian and US subsidiaries to ICBC.

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Canada)

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的加拿大子公司，其前身为加拿大东亚银行。
description.en: The Canadian subsidiary of ICBC, formerly the Bank of East Asia (Canada).

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行控股的寿险公司，前身为金盛人寿保险。
description.en: A life insurance company controlled by ICBC, formerly known as AXA-Minmetals Assurance.

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Argentina)

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的阿根廷子公司，其前身为阿根廷标准银行。
description.en: The Argentinian subsidiary of ICBC, formerly Standard Bank Argentina.

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (USA)

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的美国子公司，其前身为美国东亚银行。
description.en: The US subsidiary of ICBC, formerly the Bank of East Asia (USA).

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Turkey)

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的土耳其子公司，其前身为Tekstilbank。
description.en: The Turkish subsidiary of ICBC, formerly Tekstilbank.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，其警方曾以涉嫌洗钱为由搜查工商银行马德里分行。
description.en: A European country whose police raided the ICBC Madrid branch on suspicion of money laundering.

description.zh-cn: 一个国际黑客组织，曾攻击中国工商银行的美国子公司。
description.en: An international hacker group that attacked a US subsidiary of ICBC.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的美国子公司，于2023年遭到黑客攻击。
description.en: A US subsidiary of ICBC that was targeted by a cyberattack in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行的下属基金管理公司。
description.en: A fund management subsidiary of ICBC.

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Asia)

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行在香港地区的下属机构。
description.en: A subsidiary of ICBC in Hong Kong.

en: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Macau)

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行在澳门地区的下属机构。
description.en: A subsidiary of ICBC in Macau.

relationships.target: 中国工商银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国工商银行由中国人民银行的工商信贷和储蓄业务分离而设立。
description.en: ICBC was established by separating the industrial and commercial credit and savings business from the People's Bank of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 中国工商银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院于1983年9月决定分拆中国人民银行的相关业务，成立一家新银行，即后来的中国工商银行。
description.en: In September 1983, the State Council of the People's Republic of China decided to spin off relevant businesses from the People's Bank of China to establish a new bank, which became ICBC.

relationships.source: 中央汇金投资有限责任公司
relationships.target: 中国工商银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 作为主要股东持有中国工商银行34.79%的股份。
description.en: Holds 34.79% of ICBC's shares as a major shareholder.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国财政部
relationships.target: 中国工商银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 作为主要股东持有中国工商银行31.14%的股份。
description.en: Holds 31.14% of ICBC's shares as a major shareholder.

relationships.target: 中国工商银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 通过其代理人公司香港中央结算代理人有限公司作为主要股东持有中国工商银行24.18%的股份。
description.en: Holds 24.18% of ICBC's shares as a major shareholder through its nominee, HKSCC Nominees Limited.

relationships.source: 全国社会保障基金理事会
relationships.target: 中国工商银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 作为主要股东持有中国工商银行3.46%的股份。
description.en: Holds 3.46% of ICBC's shares as a major shareholder.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行股份有限公司
relationships.target: 上海证券交易所

description.zh-cn: 在上海证券交易所首次公开发行股票并上市。
description.en: Conducted its initial public offering and listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行股份有限公司
relationships.target: 香港交易所

description.zh-cn: 在香港交易所首次公开发行股票并上市。
description.en: Conducted its initial public offering and listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.

relationships.target: 中国工商银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 恒指服务有限公司于2007年2月9日宣布，将工商银行纳入恒生指数成份股，并于3月12日生效。
description.en: Hang Seng Indexes Company Limited announced on February 9, 2007, that ICBC would be included as a constituent stock of the Hang Seng Index, effective March 12.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行股份有限公司
relationships.target: 南非标准银行

description.zh-cn: 斥资56亿美元收购南非标准银行20%的股权，成为其第一大股东。
description.en: Acquired a 20% stake in Standard Bank of South Africa for US$5.6 billion, becoming its largest shareholder.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行股份有限公司
relationships.target: 工银金融租赁

description.zh-cn: 在天津滨海新区注册成立工银金融租赁有限公司。
description.en: Established ICBC Financial Leasing Co., Ltd. in Tianjin Binhai New Area.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行股份有限公司
relationships.target: 中国工商银行（加拿大）

description.zh-cn: 斥资8,025万加元向东亚银行收购前身加拿大东亚银行70%股权。
description.en: Acquired a 70% stake in the former Bank of East Asia (Canada) from the Bank of East Asia for C$80.25 million.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行股份有限公司
relationships.target: 工银安盛保险

description.zh-cn: 斥资12亿元人民币购入前身金盛人寿保险60％股权，成为控股股东。
description.en: Acquired a 60% stake in the former AXA-Minmetals Assurance for RMB 1.2 billion, becoming the controlling shareholder.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行股份有限公司
relationships.target: 中国工商银行（阿根廷）

description.zh-cn: 斥资6亿美元购入前身阿根廷标准银行80%股权。
description.en: Acquired an 80% stake in the former Standard Bank Argentina for US$600 million.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行股份有限公司
relationships.target: 中国工商银行（美国）

description.zh-cn: 斥资1.4亿美元向东亚银行收购前身美国东亚银行80%股权。
description.en: Acquired an 80% stake in the former Bank of East Asia (USA) from the Bank of East Asia for US$140 million.

relationships.source: 中国工商银行股份有限公司
relationships.target: 中国工商银行（土耳其）

description.zh-cn: 斥资6.7亿元土耳其里拉收购前身Tekstilbank之75.5%股份。
description.en: Acquired a 75.5% stake in the former Tekstilbank for TRY 670 million.

relationships.target: 中国工商银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 西班牙警方以“涉及洗黑钱及税务欺诈”为名，突击搜查中国工商银行马德里分行，并拘捕5名银行管理层人员。
description.en: Spanish police raided the ICBC Madrid branch on suspicion of money laundering and tax fraud, arresting five members of the bank's management.

relationships.target: 工银金融服务

description.zh-cn: 国际黑客组织Lockbit攻击了中国工商银行的美国子公司工银金融服务，导致其交易中断。
description.en: The international hacker group Lockbit attacked ICBC Financial Services, a US subsidiary of ICBC, causing disruptions to its trading.

relationships.target: 中国工商银行股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 工银金融服务是中国工商银行的美国子公司。
description.en: ICBC Financial Services is a US subsidiary of ICBC.
